ownerships.owner: Trump Marks Fine Foods Member Corp.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president/member of Trump Marks Fine Foods LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $15,001 - $50,000 in royalties income from TRUMP MARKS FINE FOODS LLC, valued at $1,001 - $15,000. Value reported reflects bank account holding only. Additional Underlying Asset: license deal with TWO RIVERS COFFEE - value not readily ascertainable. License holder, New York, NY. See attached schedule.

Former president/director/chairman of Trump Marks Fine Foods Member Corp, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberEthics.business: Trump Marks Fine Foods Member Corp.
